title: Experts Say Corporations Like Target Are Doing Wearable Challenges All Wrong
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Latest News - Today 
When corporations like Target do a seasonal Fitbit challenge, nobody wins says Sonic Boom co-founder Danna Korn....
